Name: VGEBY Brushless Motor 1PCS 5010 360KV
Notes: These two motors power the arms and have high torque that can quickly pull up the legs enabling the robot to jump

Name: WWZMDiB 4Pcs AS5600 Magnetic Encoder 3.3V 12bit high Precision Magnetic Induction Angle Measurement Sensor Module
Notes: These are used for getting motor position

Name: ESP32-DevKitC-32E Development Board
Notes: This is the main microcontroller for the robot which has a very fast tick rate for self-balancing

Name: ZMR 40A Bidirectional Brushless 2-6S UBEC 3A 5V ESC
Notes: These ESCs will control the leg and wheel motors

Name: MF148ZZ Flanged Ball Bearing ID 8mm x OD 14mm x Width 4mm
Notes: Smaller flanged bearings to support leg pivots

Name: F6802-2RS 10PCS Flanged Bearing 15×24×5mm
Notes: Medium size flanged bearings for the leg joints at knee and wheel

Name: F6804-2RS 4PCS Flanged Ball Bearing 20mm x 32mm x 7mm
Notes: Larger flanged bearings for main leg pivot joints in the body

Name: SpeedyBee ELRS FPV Receiver - 2.4ghz ExpressLRS Nano Receiver Drone RX Module with 78mm UFL T Antenna
Notes: ELRS receiver to control the robot with a remote

Name: 0.96 Inch OLED Display Module 12864 LCD Screen 128x64 IIC I2C OLED Board SSD1315
Notes: 2 small OLED screens that will serve as the robots eyes
